alert.note: Alert for Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 27 at 8:47PM PST until February 28 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 7 inches in the Methow Valley. Localized accumulations up to 11 inches Upper Methow Valley including Mazama. * WHERE...Winthrop, Methow, Twisp, Mazama, Conconully, and Loup Loup Pass. * WHEN...Until Noon PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Motorists should expect winter driving conditions Sunday Night and Monday morning in the Methow Valley.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
